answers.answer: Im so sorry for your loss.did they put you on anything for the b/p?

no they told me to lay on my side. i went to the hospital on a wednesday night for stomach pains and they said my b/p was way to high and they made me lay o n my side til friday then they let me go and told me to come back on monday for monitoring and when i went in they flew me to johns hopkins that day and i had a c-section that night. they never gave me anything at the local hospital but the gave me magnisium at johns hopkins she was born at 8:13 and died at 10:29

im so sorry. I dont know anything about maternal hellp syndrome. But I did have to be induce with my son because of Very high b/p and maybe the start of preeclam. When I got pregnant again my b/p was high again and my doc. put me on meds for it. Did you have the high b/p the hold pregnancy or just that one time? Sorry I cant help more.

i only had high b/p just that one time and they said i might have had it for a week. i think my ob is a freakin joke. i dont think she knows what she i doing. every time i went to her office she saw me for a total of 3 minutes and all she did was ask me a few questions and listen to the babys heart beat.
I would find a new ob. one that you like and can trust. Well, most monthly check ups are just in and out.

question: ok i had my period last month from the26th to the 2nd on the night of  the first i stopped and the next morning when i got to work i started bleeding heavy and it was dark red. my period wasVERY unusually light. i had a little girl on june 25, i was 6 months and she passed away because of maternal hellp syndrome and severe preeclampsia, it was my first pregnancy. ive had bad headaches, bloating,increased urination,mood swings, backaches, and bad cramps for the past couple weeks. i took 2 pregnancy tests last month a week apart but both came up negative could i be pregnant anyway. i used a fact plus p/t. it took me a year to get pregnant the first time. Also, what are the chances of preeclampsia and the maternal hellp syndrome coming back??? my blood pressure for the last pregnancy was 160/105!!!  HELP ME PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!
title: whats going on?!!!!!
